name: Seventh Middle East Conference on Global Business, Economics, Finance and Banking
content: Dear & Esteemed Colleagues, Greetings! Global Business Research Journals (GBRJ) & Greater Vision are greatly pleased to extend a warm welcome to you to the Seventh Middle East Conference on Global Business, Economics, Finance and Banking (ME18Dubai Conference). May we cordially invite you to be part of the upcoming academic research conference in the beautiful city of Dubai, UAE from October 6-7, 2018\. May we extend a warm welcome to you to submit your research papers/abstracts/case studies in all areas of business and social research? You may also submit your abstracts/full papers/case studies using the ‘online submission window’ available at the ‘paper submission’ page or you may also submit your abstracts or full paper or case studies or posters to our conference email id: dubaioctconf@globalbizresearch.org. In addition, in the interest of global academic community, we do organize a panel discussion on the following topic. We are, pretty sure that this discussion would add greater value to enhance your support to your students. Topic: “Technology and Your Class” – Changing Scenario!
